text:
Our friends at UA have released some IoT tools - might be worth digging into: 
Urban Airship Expands its Mobile Platform to Transform Customer Communications
<https://www.urbanairship.com/company/press-releases/urban-airship-expands-its-mobile-platform-to-transform-customer-communicati>

Making Sure Your Future, Our Future, Everyone’s Future is Wide Open
<https://www.urbanairship.com/blog/making-sure-your-future-our-future-everyones-future-is-wide-open>

Mobile Growth Platform
<https://www.urbanairship.com/products/mobile-growth>

attachments.title: Urban Airship Expands its Mobile Platform to Transform Customer Communications
attachments.text: Among several advancements announced today, next-generation Open Profiles and Open Channels platform services will enable businesses to use real-time customer data from any system to individually interact with customers on any platform, device or marketing channel. The first actualization of this open channels approach is support for Apple News notifications.
attachments.fallback: Urban Airship: Urban Airship Expands its Mobile Platform to Transform Customer Communications

attachments.title: Making Sure Your Future, Our Future, Everyone’s Future is Wide Open
attachments.text: Learn how Urban Airship’s sees the future of mobile growth, and how our next-generation Mobile Growth Platform is turning our vision into reality.
attachments.fallback: Urban Airship: Making Sure Your Future, Our Future, Everyone’s Future is Wide Open

attachments.title: Mobile Growth Platform | Urban Airship
attachments.text: Urban Airship's Mobile Growth platform lets you bring lightweight, action-oriented notifications, integrated into any experience along the customer journey.
attachments.fallback: Urban Airship: Mobile Growth Platform | Urban Airship
